channel.title: Wildy dupe fixed

item.title: Wildy dupe fixed
item.dc:creator: @asdjf asdjf
item.description:
@asdjf wrote:

Hey, so i’ve managed to come up with a temp fix for the wildy dupe…

Disable ALL use of the logout button, and then adding a log out command for examepl…

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“log”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {

   if(absX >= 2417 && absX <= 2431 && absY >= 3096 && absY <= 3118) { sM("You Cannot Log Out In A Combat Zone."); return; } }

else { if(absX >= 2967 && absX <= 2991 && absY >= 3605 && absY <= 3628) { sM(“You Cannot Log Out In A Combat Zone.”); return; }
else { if (wildyLevel > 1 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))
sM(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!”);
return;
}
else { logout(); } }[/code]

the co-ords are your pvp area’s suchas a bounty hunter, funpk and the wilderness part is pretty self explanatory…

however here is where i need help…

i put this code with all my other codes, and it seems to be causing a problem… when ever i use ANY code be it ::pickup or ::yell i logout… and… using ANY code in the restricted area, returns [you cannot log out]

why is this?

Read full topic
